metadata.synopsis: Julius Caesar (Kenneth Williams) cavorts with Cleopatra (Amanda Barrie), then figures out who his friends are.

reviews: Even with such an unrelenting onslaught of absurdities, few are memorable or inspire genuine belly-laughs.

Most of the players have their moments, although these are perhaps too few for some old stalwarts like Joan Sims. Amanda Barrie, however, as a comically suburban Cleo makes a worthy addition to the team.
